alert.note: Alert for Northern Jackson; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 1:19PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson County through 145 PM CDT... At 119 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Escatawpa, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moss Point, Escatawpa, Gautier, Helena, Big Point, Vancleave, Hickory Hills, Wade and Hurley. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 62 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
